mapper.select: select t.*,b.hotel_sin_name,h.title from t_price_item t,t_businessman b,t_hotel_type h where t.businessman_id=b.id and t.hotel_type_id=h.id and t.id = #{id}
select t.*,b.hotel_sin_name,h.title from t_price_item t,t_businessman b,t_hotel_type h where t.businessman_id=b.id and t.hotel_type_id=h.id order by t.create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into t_price_item (businessman_id, hotel_type_id, price, number,is_active) values (#{businessManId}, #{hotelTypeId},#{price}, #{number},#{isActive})
mapper.update: update t_price_item set is_active=#{status} where id=#{id}
